q_en: What are the top three products made in all orders in total?
gt:
Hey there! ğŸ˜„ Let's dive into the top three products made in all orders. Here's a neat little table for you:

| Product ID | Total Made | Attributes     | Description |
|------------|------------|----------------|-------------|
| 7          | 540        | Purple, M size | Skirt       |
| 15         | 345        | Pink, M size   | Skirt       |
| 27         | 260        | Yellow, S size | T-shirt     |

These are the champions of production! ğŸ† If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, SUM(op.number) as total_made FROM order_product op JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY total_made DESC LIMIT 3;
steps.description: Retrieve the total number of each product made in all orders

steps.sql: SELECT p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (7, 15, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the attributes and type description for the top three products
